name: Adjustable Bench
description: An adjustable bench for strength training and exercise, ideal for a variety of workouts such as chest presses, shoulder presses, and more. The bench can be adjusted to multiple incline and decline positions to suit various exercises.

name: Barbell Olympic Trap Bar
description: A high-quality Olympic Trap Bar designed for strength training, perfect for deadlifts, shrugs, and other lifting exercises. Its unique design reduces stress on the back while increasing the range of motion.

name: Flat Weight Bench
description: A durable flat weight bench designed for weightlifting and other fitness exercises. It's a versatile bench for a variety of strength training movements, including chest presses and abdominal workouts.

name: Barbell 150 LB Coated Hex Dumbbell
description: A coated hex dumbbell set weighing 150 lbs, designed for heavy lifting. This durable set is ideal for a variety of strength exercises, providing excellent grip and control.

name: Encased Hex Dumbbell Sets
description: A set of rubber-encased hex dumbbells designed for home or commercial gyms. These dumbbells are great for various strength exercises, offering durability and protection for your floors.

name: Powertec Leg Press P-LP1923
description: A leg press machine designed for heavy-duty leg workouts. This equipment features a smooth motion for leg extensions, leg presses, and calf raises, providing excellent lower-body strength development.

name: fullbody home machine
description: A versatile full-body home gym machine that combines multiple functions in one unit. It includes adjustable settings for preacher curls, overhead presses, and more, ideal for a complete workout at home.

name: Leg Extension & Leg Curl GCEC-STK
description: A high-performance leg extension and leg curl machine designed for isolating leg muscles. With a 30% discount, this machine provides excellent strength training for your quadriceps and hamstrings.

name: Smith Machine WB-RS19
description: A heavy-duty Smith machine with a roller system designed for various strength training exercises. This machine offers safety and stability for weightlifting, ideal for both beginners and advanced athletes.

name: Olympic Bar for Weightlifting
description: An Olympic barbell designed for weightlifting. Built to withstand heavy loads and provide optimal balance for a variety of exercises, including deadlifts, squats, and presses. Ideal for both home and commercial gyms.
